governor_profile.angelic_role: Throne of Threefold Time; marshals tideborn guardians.
governor_profile.essence: In POTHNIR's presence, vision spans threefold time past, present, and future refract together into a single, balanced ray.

form.name: fluid_crystalline
form.description: A translucent, multi-layered form that shifts between liquid water and prismatic crystal structures, representing the liminal space between material and ethereal realms

color.reasoning: Aquamarine represents water's wisdom and Netzach's transformative energy, while silver reflects the lunar cycles of time and divine reflection

geometry.reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent divine interconnection, dimensional transitions, and the multifaceted nature of perception

environment.reasoning: Creates waves of perceptual shifts, expanding consciousness beyond linear time constraints

time_variations.reasoning: Represents the threefold nature of time as a spiraling, interconnected experience

energy_signature.reasoning: Embodies the fluid dynamic of wisdom that moves beyond fixed perceptions

symbol_set.reasoning: Symbols representing divine judgment, fluid wisdom, and multidimensional perception

light_shadow.reasoning: Represents the equal importance of illumination and the unknown in true wisdom

special_properties.reasoning: Unique manifestation of an oracle angel that can dissolve perceptual boundaries

governor_profile.name: POTHNIR
governor_profile.title: 'Son of the three fold throne'
